message.content:
cs.MA, cs.GT, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS 

This paper deals with the problem of optimizing revenue for ride-sharing platforms through dynamic pricing and vehicle dispatching policies. This involves modeling the problem as a Markov decision process and finding an efficient algorithm to compute the optimal solution. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.MA (Multi-Agent Systems), followed by cs.GT (Game Theory) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also involves optimization techniques and empirical evaluations, which suggest the sub-categories cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) as possible choices.
